text:
Aurélie Battu (born 18 September 1997) is a French water polo player.
She was a member of the France women's national water polo team at the 2015 World Aquatics Championships, and 2017 World Aquatics Championships. and 2018 Women's European Water Polo Championship.
On a club level, she plays for Union Saint-Bruno Bordeaux.

annotations.surface_form: France women's national water polo team
